'''Icy Featherflight''' is [[Kaeya]]'s Default [[Character Outfit]].

==Appearance==
<!-- Keep appearance section short and concise. Limit to 1-2 paragraphs (preferably 1 paragraph) with 3-4 sentences each. -->
Kaeya wears a half-cape with a fur collar; a white-collared, cleavage-revealing blouse; dark, tight-fitted trousers; and knee-length boots. His [[Vision]] hangs from a loose brown belt, which also has a blue gem and a rope. He has a blue earring on his left ear.
